rule: Each category label should be followed by a colon and a single space before the list.
input: Text: Tesla and SpaceX were praised by Elon Musk for their achievements in AI.
coverage:
Company names: Tesla, SpaceX  
People names: Elon Musk  
Specific topics: AI  
General themes: Achievements
validityText:
The given input is a text string, which contains a sentence of natural language. It specifically mentions companies (Tesla and SpaceX) and a person (Elon Musk), as well as a particular topic (achievements in AI). According to the input specification, the input must contain sentences or paragraphs of natural language and can include names of companies, people, specific topics, and general themes. The text appears to be comprehensible and fits these criteria, fulfilling all the required aspects outlined in the input specification. Hence, there are no violations of the input specification in the given text.

OK
